name: OKLink Avalanche Explorer
highlight: OKLink Avalanche Explorer, allowing users to search transactions, blocks, wallet addresses, smart contracts, and other on-chain data on Avalanche chain.
summary: OKLink blockchain explorer allows users to search through transactions, blocks, wallet addresses, smart contracts, and other on-chain data covering 13 mainstream chains including BTC, ETH, BSC, Avalanche, Solana, polygonï¼Œetc.
